kg_interactions.description: Acetylsalicylic acid may increase the anticoagulant activities of Warfarin.
Metoprolol may decrease the excretion rate of Warfarin which could result in a higher serum level.
Acetylsalicylic acid may decrease the antihypertensive activities of Metoprolol.

kg_interactions.description: Ibuprofen may decrease the excretion rate of Warfarin which could result in a higher serum level.

Lisinopril may decrease the excretion rate of Warfarin which could result in a higher serum level.
